sentences.english: We also bought a lemon tree and a tangerine tree.
sentences.chinese: 還買了一樹檸檬，和濟州蜜橘。

sentences.english: The meeting is to be held on Jeju Island of the ROK from May 29 to 30.
sentences.chinese: 此次會議將於5月29日至30日在韓國濟州島舉行。

sentences.english: Female divers of the Jeju Islands. Image by Brenda Paik Suno.
sentences.chinese: 濟州島的女性撈海者，圖由白蘇諾攝。

sentences.english: Thus, half of Jeju-do island is taken up by hunting grounds.
sentences.chinese: 因此，直到今天，濟州島近一半面積仍是狩獵場。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Seoul and Cheju on CX.
sentences.chinese: 韓國航空公司來回首爾至濟州機場經濟客位機票。

sentences.english: The government says the test grid in Jeju is the largest such project in the world.
sentences.chinese: 政府說在濟州島試驗電網是世界此類最大的項目。
